Hi Trigger - Record Created➛...➛First name Trigger➛...➛Last name,

 

 Trigger➛...➛Name has created a new request of high priority with the following details.

You are requested to take action as soon as possible as it hinders with work.


Request No: Trigger➛...➛Number
Request Type: Trigger➛...➛Request Type
Description: Trigger➛...➛Short Desc

Thanks.
Admin
